channel.title: [2006] FTP RuneScape
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://hybridcraft.byethost18.com/img/title2/rslogo3.gif[/img] [size=1]credits to lostmyphat for thread layout :)[/size] Hello, I'm Ritonda and this is my project thread.I'm remaking the F2P of RuneScape. I'm doing that because I love FTP and I want to learn 'coding' in a RSPS. [SIZE=1]if you see a grammatical error tell me that.[/SIZE]
Project started: 1st of October 2012 Date now: Project finished:
[COLOR=#ff0000]The red color code means the feature has not yet been started.[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ffc000]The orange color code means the feature has been started and is under construction.[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00b050]The green color code means the feature has been finished.[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img]Combat[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] [COLOR=#ff0000]PvP fully complete[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]PvN fully complete[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Perfect max hit formulas[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Perfect accuracy formula[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Equipment requirements[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img]Magic[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [COLOR=#ff0000]Every modern combat spell[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Can't mage through walls[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Alching[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img]Ranged[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [COLOR=#ff0000]Bows/arrows[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Can't shoot through walls[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] Prayer[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] [COLOR=#00b050]All bones bury-able[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Every prayer working properly[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img]Mining[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [COLOR=#ff0000]Emptying and refilling rocks[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]All ores can be mined[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Prospecting[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Random chance of obtaining gems[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] Smithing[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [COLOR=#ff0000]All bars can be made[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]All bars can be forged into items[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]All equipment can be produced[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img]Fishing[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [COLOR=#ff0000]All fish can be caught[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Big net fishing[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Correct item requirements[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Fishing spots located all around the world[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Correct animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Moving fishing locations[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] Cooking[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [COLOR=#ff0000]Picking wheat[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Filling flour bin[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Bread[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Pizza[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Cakes[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Potatoes[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Eating food (in pieces)[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Correct animation and timing used[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] Woodcutting[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] [COLOR=green]Stumps and regrowing trees[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Correct hatchet finding[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Correct hatchet animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]All trees cut-able[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] Firemaking [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [COLOR=#ff0000]All logs light able[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Correct animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Clipped[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] Crafting[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [COLOR=#ff0000]Leather crafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Full tanning[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Pottery (fired and unfired)[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Gem cutting[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Jewellry making[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] Runecrafting[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [COLOR=#ff0000]All altars working[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Correct multiple crafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Talismans "pull" to altars[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Tiaras enchanting[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img]Music and Sounds and Others [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] [COLOR=#ff0000]All skilling sounds[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Various attacking sounds[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000]Music on region of player[/COLOR] Working doors Working trapdoors Travelling with a ship
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img]Quests[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [COLOR=#ff0000]Cook's Assistant[/COLOR]
[CENTER][SIZE=5] [/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=5] Change log:[/SIZE][/CENTER] [code] 2nd of October: Added many shops runescape-like 2nd of October: Added woodcutting base 1st of October: added basic chat filter 1st of October: fixed bankers ( they didn't open the bank before) 1st of october: all FTP bones are working. the prayer class was already in the source. I just had to add it to ClickItem. 1st of october: Added the Al-Kharid gate. You have to pay 10 coins to cross it. [/code][/center] [CENTER][SIZE=5]Media:[/SIZE][/CENTER] [center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hppC6.gif[/img] [/center]

item.dc:creator: @ritonda ritonda
item.description:

runescape sucks:

The firth, he has a pronunciation problem

uhm what?

also another one? there are actually bout 4 projects like this running,

PI.
I know there are already many projects about it, and I dont really care about that
Thank you

Broken Britain:

How come this was unlocked after being locked for using someone else’s name and banner?

I talked to the mod who closed this thread

[/li][li]You can open your bank with a banker.
[/li][li]Fixing the little chat problem.[/li][/ul]

item.title: [2006] FTP RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @ritonda ritonda
item.description:
@ritonda wrote:

[center]
[size=1]credits to lostmyphat for thread layout :)[/size]
Hello, I’m Ritonda and this is my project thread.I’m remaking the F2P of RuneScape. I’m doing that because I love FTP and I want to learn ‘coding’ in a RSPS.
[SIZE=1]if you see a grammatical error tell me that.[/SIZE]

Project started: 1st of October 2012
Date now:
Project finished:

[COLOR=#ff0000]The red color code means the feature has not yet been started.[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ffc000]The orange color code means the feature has been started and is under construction.[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#00b050]The green color code means the feature has been finished.[/COLOR]

Combat
[COLOR=#ff0000]PvP fully complete[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]PvN fully complete[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Perfect max hit formulas[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Perfect accuracy formula[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Equipment requirements[/COLOR]

Magic
[COLOR=#ff0000]Every modern combat spell[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Can’t mage through walls[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Alching[/COLOR]

Ranged
[COLOR=#ff0000]Bows/arrows[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Can’t shoot through walls[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/COLOR]

Prayer
[COLOR=#00b050]All bones bury-able[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Every prayer working properly[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/COLOR]

Mining
[COLOR=#ff0000]Emptying and refilling rocks[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]All ores can be mined[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Prospecting[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Random chance of obtaining gems[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/COLOR]

Smithing
[COLOR=#ff0000]All bars can be made[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]All bars can be forged into items[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]All equipment can be produced[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/COLOR]

Fishing
[COLOR=#ff0000]All fish can be caught[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Big net fishing[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Correct item requirements[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Fishing spots located all around the world[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Correct animations[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Moving fishing locations[/COLOR]

Cooking
[COLOR=#ff0000]Picking wheat[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Filling flour bin[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Bread[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Pizza[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Cakes[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Potatoes[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Eating food (in pieces)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Correct animation and timing used[/COLOR]

Woodcutting
[COLOR=green]Stumps and regrowing trees[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Correct hatchet finding[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Correct hatchet animations[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]All trees cut-able[/COLOR]

Firemaking
[COLOR=#ff0000]All logs light able[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Correct animations[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Clipped[/COLOR]

Crafting
[COLOR=#ff0000]Leather crafting[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Full tanning[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Pottery (fired and unfired)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Gem cutting[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Jewellry making[/COLOR]

Runecrafting
[COLOR=#ff0000]All altars working[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Correct multiple crafting[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Talismans “pull” to altars[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Tiaras enchanting[/COLOR]

Music and Sounds and Others
[COLOR=#ff0000]All skilling sounds[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Various attacking sounds[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000]Music on region of player[/COLOR]
Working doors
Working trapdoors
Travelling with a ship

Quests
[COLOR=#ff0000]Cook’s Assistant[/COLOR]

[CENTER][SIZE=5]
[/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=5] Change log:[/SIZE][/CENTER]

2nd of October: Added many shops runescape-like 2nd of October: Added woodcutting base 1st of October: added basic chat filter 1st of October: fixed bankers ( they didn't open the bank before) 1st of october: all FTP bones are working. the prayer class was already in the source. I just had to add it to ClickItem. 1st of october: Added the Al-Kharid gate. You have to pay 10 coins to cross it. [/center]
[CENTER][SIZE=5]Media:[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[center]

hppC6.gif760×502

[/center]
